text: Joe Hudson (born May 1, 1965) is an American professional stock car racing driver. He last competed part-time in the Camping World Truck Series, driving the No. 74 Chevrolet Silverado for Mike Harmon Racing. ==Racing career== ===Camping World Truck Series=== Hudson made his first and only Camping World Truck Series start at Canadian Tire Motorsport Park, driving the No. 74 truck for Mike Harmon Racing. He started 32nd and finished 27th after a brake failure. ==Motorsports career results== ===NASCAR=== (key) (Bold – Pole position awarded by qualifying time.
